QuestData.Title: The Thunder Below
QuestData.Description: Roars have been echoing out from inside the Guo-Lai Halls. The mogu have awakened some ancient beast, and it will not be long before they attempt to release it upon my men.$B$BFind your way to the Hall of the Serpent and slay the beast before it can be unleashed upon us. I would trust no other with such a dangerous and important task.
